Need work done?

Need some work done on your ride?

Give us a bit to respond with a detailed estimate. We need time to do a through review to research and write your estimate.

1 Get a Quote

Tells us what's wrong with your car or work you want done. We'll shoot back a detailed estimate that includes diagnosis, parts, and labor.

2 Approve Repairs

Once you approve the estimate, we'll book an appoitment to drop off your car and our team will get to work.

3 Time is Money

Only pay for time our team is working on your car. We use strict time tracking to ensure you won't pay extra.

4 Hit the Road

Our certified team will fix your car and get you back on the road.

To ensure a prompt response, please enter your valid phone number and email

Please be patient: It can take a day or 2 for smaller jobs and a few days for more complex requests.

Restyling

Custom Wheels and Tires

A custom wheel can change your car’s stance and give it a lot more personality. The challenge with classic cars is the specific wheel size and bolt pattern. We’ll make sure we match the correct wheel and tire to your car to provide an improved, and safe, driving experience.

Custom Graphics

Let us help by using our years of design experience to truly personalize your ride and make it turn heads.

How Driven Does It Right

Tips from the Pros

After years under cars, we've honed the best installation matched with the right parts to do the job right

Restyling tips

Lighting Upgrades

Compared to modern cars, your classic car’s headlights leave you in the dark. LED replacement lamps offer farther-reaching light for safer nighttime driving. We can give you modern, improved lighting without compromising the classic vintage look.
